featured.text: Yusra Mardini is a swimmer who grew up in Popole Misenga was born in the Democratic the war-torn country of Syria.

definition.zh_def: 馬爾丁尼（Mardini）是一個常見的姓氏，可能指代某些特定的人物或地點。
definition.en_def: Mardini is a common surname, possibly referring to specific individuals or places.
definition.example: The story of the Mardini sisters inspired many around the world.
